Uses of Package
org.nnsoft.shs.http

Packages that use org.nnsoft.shs.http
org.nnsoft.shs Public APIs of a simple HTTP Server. 
org.nnsoft.shs.core.http Base implementation of HTTP entities. 
org.nnsoft.shs.core.http.parse HTTP Request pull parser implementation. 
org.nnsoft.shs.core.http.serialize HTTP Response serializer implementation. 
org.nnsoft.shs.demo Simple HTTP Server demo that relies on core implementation. 
org.nnsoft.shs.http Public APIs of HTTP protocol entities. 
 

Classes in org.nnsoft.shs.http used by org.nnsoft.shs
RequestHandler
          A request handler is a lighter version of HttpServlet to implement HTTP negotiation.
Response.Status
